subject: Baseball
Light-Emitting Diodes
lead_paragraph: The 60-by-60-foot Citgo sign that hovers near Fenway Park has temporarily gone dark as more than 9,000 feet of lights are being replaced.
snippet: The 60-by-60-foot Citgo sign that hovers near Fenway Park has temporarily gone dark as more than 9,000 feet of lights are being replaced.
